hero.title: Organize your life
hero.description: FlickDo is an open-source application to manage your tasks and collaborate with your team. Simple, powerful, and completely free.

features.title: Everything you need to be productive

taskManagement.title: Task Management
taskManagement.description: Create, organize, and complete your tasks with an intuitive interface. Add dates, priorities, and tags to keep everything in order.

collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
collaboration.description: Share lists, assign tasks to members, and manage permissions. Perfect for team projects.

multipleLists.title: Multiple Lists
multipleLists.description: Organize your work, studies, and personal life in separate lists. Navigate easily between all your lists.

tags.title: Custom Tags

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Visualize your productivity with detailed graphs and statistics of your daily and weekly progress.
